The Technology That Cares

PETKIT is a high-tech company founded in 2013,committed to developing an all-in-one solution through the product line consisting of “eat,drink,clean,sleep,and fun” to encourage an intelligent life with your fur pal.

PETKIT proudly creates elegant,sustainable,and cost-effective products that won Red Dot Design Award,iF Design Award,and a number of patents,which have provided to over 30 countries all over the world.

Ultra-quiet pump(below 30dB),low energy consumption,gives you and your pets 100% sweet sleep
Smart LED Indicator Light remind you the fountain working status.SMART and NORMAL mode are available
Triple Filtration System provides healthy, fresh and oxygen-enriched water for your pets
Note:Powered with USB cable (5V adapter not included) and Pump is replaceable










Intuitive to monitor

The built-in led light reminds you of the fountain’s working status, such as water shortage and filter replacement.

Auto shut-off for protection

The pump will automatically shut off when the water storage level is too low.

Easy to clean

The pump is detachable, replaceable, and very easy to clean.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) 【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)



【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

4.5
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:29:58 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Price: $27.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:33 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Humidifiers 250ML & 2L

Humidifiers 4L & 6L

Tank Cleaners & Heating Pads

Heating Pads & Massagers

Heating Wrap & Spin Scrubbers

THE PERFECT BALANCE BETWEEN POWER AND PORTABILITY: The lightweight compact, slim design makes it the perfect choice for any environment. A great humidifier for bedroom, office, baby room, or car, just turn it on, and enjoy better, healthier air
BOOST COMFORT LEVELS INSTANTLY: The ultrasonic cool mist humidifier comes with two mist modes – continuous & intermittent – able to change the environmental humidity in minutes. An intuitive one-button control, without needless and complicated settings, and an auto shut-off feature for your safety and calmness
INSTANT DRYNESS FIXER: YOUR LUNGS WILL THANK YOU! Our brand new humidifier for bedroom or office incorporates an elegant, compact design, making it super-portable and easy to use. Erie desk humidifier will fine-tune the humidity levels of your surroundings, allowing you to breathe a healthier air, and make your environment a lot more pleasant
SLEEP TIGHT: While you are sound asleep, our humidifiers for bedrooms moisturize the room at the 38dB noise level. The unit is as quiet as a ticking clock
SILENT STEALTHY FUNCTION FOR DREAMY NIGHTS: Great for sleeping, it also doubles as a night-light! Soft on your eyes, this nifty little feature makes it the ideal humidifier to use at night or as a baby humidifier for nursery, offering a relaxed, quiet environment for a sound and healthy sleep.
1-YEAR WARRANTY: RISK-FREE PURCHASE & HASSLE-FREE REPLACEMENT. Please don’t hesitate to reach out. We would be more than willing to assist! Just a little tip: to increase the life of the humidifier, we recommend using GENIANI Cotton Sticks.

Geniani Erie Humidifier

Introducing the newest innovation of air humidifiers for home or office!

The Erie Humidifier is a compact, yet powerful instant dryness fixer. Now you can have the capabilities of a room humidifier in a fabulous portable version. The mini humidifier also helps with the relief of allergy symptoms and dry cough.

Key features:

  • Sleek design & smart features
  • Portable, yet powerful
  • Offers up to 8 hours runtime
  • Silent action & night-light feature
  • Cost-effective compared to larger versions

Maintenance couldn’t be simpler!

Just a little effort to refill

The Erie personal humidifier can be refilled in seconds. Gently, with a single movement, unscrew the humidifier clockwise to fill it with water.

All-day or All-night Performance

You won’t have to worry about frequent refills since its 0.06 gal (250 ml) capacity is enough to last an entire office day, or night’s sleep.

Convenience at its best

This silent humidifier is such a great addition to an office, quietly working its magic for better air. It’s powered by most USB ports or sockets. Please note. The humidifier is not equipped with a battery; it is powered by a USB cord only.

One-button Control

Simple and intuitive one-button control to switch between operating modes. No hassle, just simple for optimal convenience.

Read more

Dry air is a definite plant killer. Just like your lungs need fresher air, so do most plants need a certain level of humidity to thrive. This small humidifier for plants will keep the air at optimum humidity level, so your lovely plants will have all the moisture they need to flourish.

At home – Perfect. At the office – Perfect. In the car – Perfect

Moisturize your skin

Moisturizing helps your skin stay young and reduces the chances of skin problems.

Safe for babies

With auto-shut off and a unique nightlight function, our humidifier is a nursery room must have! Ensure your children are receiving quality air throughout the night.

Quiet like breath

Ultra-quiet <30dB operating mode to deliver utterly silent operation.

Fits on cup holder

Designed in a sleek round style which allows it to fit in small spaces such as vehicle cup holders.

Read more

item.title: PUPIHOM Cat Water Fountain, 3.4L/115oz Pet Water Dispenser for Cat, Dog Small to Medium Pets Inside, Extremely Quiet, Spill Proof Cat Fountain Water Bowl with 3 Washable Replacement Filters
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) From the brand At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs. CW002 Pet Water Fountain ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $42.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:05 UTC – Details)

From the brand

At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs.

CW002 Pet Water Fountain

CW003 Pet Water Fountain

CW004 Pet Water Fountain

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.67 x 8.58 x 5.59 inches; 2.71 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ Submarine
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 6, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ H&H
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09ZPBW85D
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Switzerland

【Wide Drinking Area】The drinking dispenser with the 300ml extra-large water dish is ideal for families with multiple pets. Even in the event of a sudden power outage, there is enough water to last a day.
【Noise-Free】The pet water fountain is equipped with unique water way design which reduces the sound of the water flow to less than 36 decibels, and enjoys a quiet moment with your cute pet.
【Premium Materials】The dispenser is made from high quality ABS material which is BPA free, for a more durable experience.
【Powerful Filtration】The 3-stage filtration system of the water fountain effectively removes sediment, dust, hair, odor, chlorine, heavy metals for a clean drinking experience.
【3 Flow Modes】The fountain has 3 modes namely spring, flower bubble and flower waterfall, which can be switched as per the pet’s needs, which will help keep your pet interested to help them drink more water.
【After Sales】With our reliable quality control, customer service and technical support, we provide you with a 6 month return policy. If you have any confusion regard to the product, please feel free to contact us.
Note: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

PUPIHOM CW003 Pet Water Fountain

* 7*24 circulating filtration, so that every drop of water can be fully purified, drinking clean, soft water for a long time is beneficial to the health of the pet’s urinary system.

* The pet water feeder solves your trouble of frequently feeding pets. The 3.4L effective capacity can supply a small and medium pet for a week, which is suitable for families who often take short trips.

* Design Patent: The water flowing from the drinking tray can wash away the hair and debris on the surface, keeping the water clean at all times.

* The appearance of this automatic water dispenser is designed by an Italian designer, which conforms to modern aesthetics, making it not only a pet water dispenser, but also matches the design of your home.

  • Model: CW003
  • Capacity: 3.4L/115oz
  • Filters: 3 Pack
  • Filter Model: PAWF001
  • ! For indoor use only!
  • ! The filter should be changed every 2 to 3 Weeks
  • ! The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks

Read more

Anti-dry-burning pump, you don’t have to worry about burning out the pump even if there is water shortage. The pump has a life span of 2.5 to 4 years.

The three-speed adjustable water pump can be used with different water outlet modes. It is recommended to use the lowest gear with the spring mode, and the mid-range and high-end gears with the faucet mode.

Removable water pump, easy to clean, proper cleaning and maintenance of the pump will help prolong the service life of the pump, it is recommended to clean it once a month.

Read more

Safety Protection: 1.2m woven power cord, which is sturdy and tight, and not easy to be bitten or chewed by pets, don’t worry about pet safety.

Minimalist structure, easy to install and clean, it is recommended to clean the pet drinking fountain once a month.

Contains 3 replacement filters. The triple filtration system with water softening function ensures safer, cleaner, and fresher drinking water, making your pet healthier.

Read more


Cat Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Pet Water Fountain
Model CW002 CW003 CW004
Capacity 1.8L/61oz 3.4L/115oz 2.4L/81oz
Flow Mode 2 3 3
Filter Model PAWF002 PAWF001 PAWF001
Replacement Filters B0B2P3Z5K2 B0B2JYRZCD B0B2JYRZCD

Q: Where can I get replacement filters?

A: Please search for B0B2JYRZCD for the replacement filters.

Q: The pet water fountain does not run with water, what should I do?

A: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

Q: Can l use this drinking fountain outside?

A: No. This fountain is designed for indoor use only.

Q: How frequently do l need to replace the filter?

A: According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, please replace the filter every 2 to 3 weeks.

Q: How often should l clean the fountain?

A: The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks. Please clean it once a week if you re living in an area with hard water.

Q: Does it have to be plugged in all the time or can it run on batteries?

A: This pet fountain has no batteries, so it needs to be always plugged in.

3.5
Price: $42.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:17:05 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Price: $35.99 - $31.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

From the brand

DEELOKI aims to “Healthy, Safety and comfortable ” life for pets. We all know that trimming pet nails is not an easy work, this unique pet nail grinder is specially made for pets with whisper quiet, fast and painless trimming.

The DEELOKI Pet Nail Grinder gives high performance grinding through any pets size.Lightweight with ultralight vibration it has amazing noise absorption.Your pet will love this amazingly simple solution to claw maintenance.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.07 x 3.07 x 2.22 inches; 12.45 Ounces
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 7, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ DEELOKI
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0BDDZXMPS

【Super Quiet & Low Vibration】: Trimming pet nails is not an easy task, and many pets are afraid of the loud sound of the dog nail grinder, which not only irritates them, but also scares them. So this professional dog nail trimmers comes in handy, with a high quality motor, super quiet and low vibration, so pets are not afraid to grind their nails.
【2 Adjustable Speed & 3 Ports】: 2-speed of power, strong and weak adjustable enough to support heavy grinding. 3 types of nail grinding, suitable for large, medium and small dogs and cats, you can choose the nail trimmer port according to the different sizes of pets and the hardness of the nails.
【Upgraded LED Light Dog Nail Trimmer】: DEELOKI pet nail grinder has LED light , so you can clearly see your pet’s blood line and avoid over-grinding and hurting your pet. Compared with other dog nail trimmers, this light will be more accurately illuminated.
【Portable Cordless &USB Rechargeable】: Cordless pet nail trimmers, compact ergonomic design, easy to carry and use, no matter when and where you can grind your pet’s nails. Rechargeable 4 hours can last up to 8 hours of use.

4.5
Price: $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:59:31 UTC – Details)

Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming. Behind the “oneisall” brand is ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $49.99 - $27.05
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:08 UTC – Details)

From the brand

oneisall

Founded in 2012

oneisall focus on creating products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience.

“oneisall” started with dog clippers. Its original intention is to allow pet lovers to enjoy simple, convenient and cost-effective services in pet grooming.

Behind the “oneisall” brand is the story of pet lover Peter. He found that taking dog for grooming would cost hundreds of dollars every month, and dog’s feeling was not good. Every time the clipper’s noise scared Joe. So Peter set out to design a low-noise and easy-to-use clipper.

Most popular products

Why do we love what we do?

At oneisall, our passion is pets,which drives us to produce the best possible products for our furry friends.We are borned from love for furbabys.

What makes our products unique?

We focus on making products that give our pets and pet owners a better experience. Leave the customer feedbacks in our top priority and put them into the design of products.

What’s our vision

oneisall hopes that we can bring peace of mind and quality to every pet owner, so that every pet can grow strong and healthy, and pet owners ca obtain longer and happier companionship.

Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.62 x 7.52 x 2.44 inches; 1.23 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 26225202-003DE
Batteries ‏ : ‎ 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required.
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ oneisall
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HRSZRXM

Safe and Sharp Blade. Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance. The blade sharp enough for a long time using. Detachable blades,easy to change and clean.
Low vibration and ultra quiet design.The noise when working is only about 50 db, to help the pet feel at ease, not afraid cut hair any more.
6 guard combs(3mm/6mm/9mm/12mm/15mm/18mm). The adjustable clipping comb is applicable for clipping hair of different lengths; and the detachable guide combs make for quick, easy comb changes and increased versatility.
Please Note: if your pets get long and thick hair, you need to use scissors cut shorter at first, otherwise the clippers may jam up and don’t work properly.

Safe and Sharp Blade

Upgrade stainless steel fixed blade and ceramic moving blade can provide excellent cutting performance and long life.

Wireless and Rechargeable

Rechargeable dog clippers with built-in battery. It can be used cordless and also used when charging.

Detachable Blades

Detachable blade for ease of changing and cleaning,which offer ultimate grooming versatility.

Make Grooming Easy

Inclued a stainless steel scissor,a stainless steel comb,a oil bottle and 6 guide guards (3mm, 6mm, 9mm, 12mm,15mm and 18mm).

Read more
